mapper.insert: insert into power_reg(id,user_name, mail, phone, encode,password) values(power_reg_seq.nextval,#{userName}, #{mail}, #{phone},#{encode},#{password})
mapper.select: select id,user_name, mail, phone,encode from power_reg where user_name=#{userName}
